data.fullContent: The halftime show was titled "Indiana Jones and the Temple of the Forbidden Eye" and was produced by Disney to promote their Indiana Jones Adventure attraction at Disneyland that opened later that year. The show featured actors playing Indiana Jones and his girlfriend Marion Ravenwood who were raiding the Vince Lombardi Trophy from the Temple of the Forbidden Eye. The show also had performances by singers Tony Bennett and Patti LaBelle, jazz trumpeter Arturo Sandoval, and the Miami Sound Machine. The show ended with everybody singing "Can You Feel The Love Tonight", the song featured in Disney's (which later acquired ABC) 1994 film The Lion King.
data.answer: 这场中场秀名为《夺宝奇兵与禁眼寺》，由迪士尼制作，旨在宣传当年晚些时候开放的迪士尼乐园的夺宝奇兵冒险景点。在这部电视剧中，演员们扮演印第安纳·琼斯和他的女朋友马里昂·瑞文伍德，他们从禁眼寺偷走了文斯·隆巴迪奖杯。歌手托尼·班尼特(Tony Bennett)和帕蒂·拉贝尔(Patti LaBelle)、爵士小号手阿图罗·桑多瓦尔(Arturo Sandoval)和迈阿密音响机器乐队(Miami Sound Machine)也在节目中表演。节目结束时，每个人都唱着“Can You Feel The Love Tonight”，这首歌曾出现在1994年迪士尼(后来收购了美国广播公司)的电影《狮子王》中。
